ygData.subject: On the topic of stats...
ygData.msgSnippet: I had heard one say on a board that there was a maximum Charisma which would alter prices at vendor, being 120... I ve currently sought quite a few Chr items
ygData.messageBody:
I had heard one say on a board that there was a maximum Charisma which would
alter prices at vendor, being 120... I've currently sought quite a few Chr
items (Stien, Silk Eve. Tunic, Order of Thunder, Leatherfoot Cap, and still
need two Oppalines) which would be enough to boost the an average Charisma
(75!) to this number... but, it is true?� I'm waiting to have a 'suit'
available so that I may fletch in a few sessions (At 92 skill, need to bug
Druid and Necro I know for some Wis and Int items ^-^; ), so probably
shouldn't devote everything to Chr...
�

Myrrh Imbris
26 Wood Elf Ranger of Karana - The Rathe
92 Fletching skill, hasn't moved since x5 patch...
/p ~51.5d
